Address.value: 200 MINUTEMAN ROAD, ANDOVER, Massachusetts, 01810, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: TransMedics Group Inc is a commercial-stage medical technology company transforming organ transplant therapy for end-stage organ failure patients across multiple disease states. It has developed the Organ Care System(OCS) to comprehensively address the limitations of cold storage. The OCS is a portable organ perfusion, optimization and monitoring system that utilizes the technology to replicate near-physiologic conditions for donor organs outside of the human body.
